ARABIC: هُنَالِكَ ٱبْتُلِىَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ وَزُلْزِلُوا۟ زِلْزَالًا شَدِيدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: at that point the muminun were tested and severely shaken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The faithful were sorely tried there and were shaken completely,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The believers were then put to a severe test and were most violently convulsed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: There the believers were tested and tremendously shaken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: That proved be the testing ground for the Muslims, and they were subjected to a severe shake.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: There, the believers were tried and shaken with a mighty shaking.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: There the believers were tried and they were shaken with severe shaking.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: there it was that the believers were tried, and shaken most mightily.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: There were the believers sorely tried, and shaken with a mighty shock.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: There the faithful were put to the proof and they were shaken as if by an earthquake.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: There were the believers proven and shaken with a mighty shaking
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: it was there that the faithful were tested and jolted with a severe agitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In that situation were the Believers tried: they were shaken as by a tremendous shaking.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: There, the believers were tried and shaken with a mighty shaking.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: there the believers were tried, they were shaken, a severe quake.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: There and then the believers were tested, and were shaken most severely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: There the believers were tested and shaken with a severe shaking.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:11] it was there that the believers were [sorely] tried, [there] they were tested, to distinguish the sincere individual from the one otherwise, and were shaken with a mighty shock, because of the severity of the terror.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (There) at that point of fear (were the believers sorely tried) they were tested with a trial, (and shaken with a mighty shock) they were terribly exhausted and violently moved.
